name: The Adventure Of Hero (juanc01)
description:
I'm a video game programming Adventure game development student.

The Adventure Of Hero game is platform to pixel, play single player, the character to complete go all the way in all areas looking to defeat enemies and villain.

Also talk to the characters.

The story his father was a brave saved the village, but now his son has to be strong and brave to face the enemies and he wants to be a hero like his father.

Spanish subtitle

Instructions

Button A   Left

Button D Right

Button W  Up

Button S   Down
